full_text: Also got to catch up on Next Best Picture’s podcast review of #EverythingEverywhereAllAtOnce . An insightful and exuberant breakdown! https://t.co/BXPL06q4dC
Recently discovered The Filmcast during Oscars coverage, and I’m already a big fan. One of the most thoughtful discussions of #EverythingEverywhere I’ve heard so far. https://t.co/4hJVoNl0p6

Have you seen #EverythingEverywhereAllAtOnce yet? It spoke deeply to my experience as a second-generation Asian American. It’s also an insanely fun science fiction film. #MichelleYeoh #KeHuyQuan #AAPI #EverythingEverywhere #A24
https://t.co/ZbcVqXRtba
The phrase #SummerOfMorbius has caught fire on #FilmTwitter this week. Here’s my take, which may explain this box office drop-off. https://t.co/35h4U3XSOJ https://t.co/Mi4xNHPgh9
#StarWarsCelebration has announced a big panel for each day except Friday. Why? What do we think is going on that day? #SWCA

This looks bonkers, even for #StrangerThings. They’re really going for it! I just wish this weren’t dropping at the same time as #ObiWanKenobi because as much as I’m looking forward to #StrangerThings4, new #StarWars clearly takes priority. https://t.co/yonkXc1ef4
Ke Huy Quan is back! He’s amazing in #EverythingEverywhere . https://t.co/uHckgjEX09
If you’re getting excited for #SWCA, this episode has a lot of fun speculation about what some of the big panels might reveal. #StarWarsCelebration2022 https://t.co/pM8msKOMjp
If you’re like me and need some quality Moon Knight coverage in your life! https://t.co/OO2iuyYECo
#StarWarsCelebration bound friends, are you doing any photo ops or autographs? Which ones?
